get-data-title.text: Click to load one of these example diagrams

parameter-quality-value.text: Slide to the right to get a better quality diagram - but it will take longer to download

parameter-is-graph-permalink.text: Display permalink of diagram at bottom-left

parameter-themes.text: Change the appearance of whole diagram by applying a theme

parameter-change-existing-items.text: Change the appearance even of existing items when applying a theme

parameter-background-colour.text: Click to change the background colour

parameter-title-name.text: Type a title to appear at the top of your diagram

parameter-graph-info.text: Store some information about your diagram such as date, author, revision number

parameter-quality.text: Slide to the right to get a higher-quality (but slower and larger) graph - png only

parameter-for-save.text: Select image type for download - png (picture) pdf or emf (for Microsoft Office)

parameter-permalink-name.text: Type a different name to save your diagram (online on desktop)

parameter-upload-dataset.text: Load a diagram from your desktop (which you saved before)

parameter-is-link-animation.text: Make the arrows appear to flow

unicode-24.text: Observation Rule (gives information on causal links)
